summary: BTS MTL: Tits or ass man
body:
BTS MTL: Tits or ass man

Requested

V

mostly a tits man

I think the definite first thing V looks for in a girl is probably her facial features… has she got a kind face? etc etc… but then boobs are like the next thing down and he might find himself accidentally perving on a girl with either a nice cleavage and / or a girl that might be showing a bit of cleavage

Suga

pretty much a tits man

He doesn’t know why, he’s just always appreciated a mighty fine set of boobs…

Jin

Yes, boobs are great to touch

I’m not even sure size of tits or ass bothers Jin but I think he might take a slight bias to the bust on a girl he gets close to

RM

both; how could he ever choose???

Smack bang in the middle of this scale, I think he’s equally a tits and ass man… legs too, definitely.

J-Hope

Butts are fantastic

I just feel like dancers might go for a good butt more because it’s attached to the legs and J-Hope likes to watch a girl’s every move, especially how she walks…

Jungkook

Just weak for a good ass

I have a feeling he might be weak for someone with a thicc butt and thighs

Jimin

He often works hard for his body so…. I guess if he has a good butt then she should have one to match

title: Ruthless | 04
body:
Header by the fabulous @honey-piggy​

Description: Your boss’ concerns prompt him to bring in a financial adviser to oversee your department and make some changes. You claim to dislike this financial adviser and the change he represents, but your actions suggest otherwise.

Pairing: Yoongi x Reader

Genre: Smut, slight fluff and angst

Word Count: 5.2k

Warnings: Dom/Sub themes, use of restraint

A/N: Feedback is greatly appreciated! 

01 | 02 | 03 | 04 | 05 | 06 | 07 | 08 | 09 | 10 

__________________________________________________

‘Do you think it will be as big as last year?’ Jimin asked.

You had perched on his desk, situated next to Tae’s as you all spoke with Hoseok about the annual Couture Halloween party. Every year, Couture threw parties for each holiday – the Couture ‘birthday’, Halloween, Christmas, New Year’s and the like. Halloween was only less than a month away so the party was being planned but that was all you knew; only the heads of each department – so in your case, Namjoon – were involved in planning to keep it a surprise for everyone else. Last years was massive, it was held at Octagon; a club that was very expensive and very hard to get in to and many celebrities – who are always invited – actually showed up last year.

Hoseok, being the head of his department, was now subject to all of your interrogations.

He shook his head, ‘you know it’s a surprise!’

‘Oh please give us a hint!’ Tae pouted, ‘I just need to know whether to get my hopes up for a repeat of last year.’
